ns1:section.ns1:title: Alergije i druge reakcije (Allergies and Other Adverse Reactions)

ns1:td.ns1:content: Z88.6 - Alergija na analgetska sredstva u osobnoj anamnezi (Z88.6 - Personal history of allergy to analgesic agent)
Z91.0 - Alergija na druge tvari, izuzevši lijekove i biološke tvari, u o (Z91.0 - Personal history of allergy, other than to drugs and biological substances)
T78.1 - Ostala štetna djelovanja hrane, nesvrstana drugamo (T78.1 - Other adverse food reactions, not elsewhere classified)
T65.2 - Toksičan učinak duhana i nikotina (T65.2 - Toxic effect: Tobacco and nicotine)
N10.0 - Akutni tubulointersticiski nefritis (N10 - Acute tubulo-interstitial nephritis)
O23.0 - Infekcije bubrega u trudnoći (O23.0 - Infections of kidney in pregnancy)
O14.1 - Teška preeklampsija (O14.1 - Severe pre-eclampsia)
E11 - Dijabetes melitus neovisan o inzulinu (E11 - Type 2 diabetes mellitus)
Z95.9 - Prisutnost srčanih i krvožilnih usadaka i presađenih dijelova, n (Z95.9 - Presence of cardiac and vascular implant and graft, unspecified)
I49.8 - Ostale označene srčane aritmije (I49.8 - Other specified cardiac arrhythmias)
E89.0 - Hipotireoza nakon medicinskog postupka (E89.0 - Postprocedural hypothyroidism)
Z98.8 - Druga specificirana stanja nakon operacije (Z98.8 - Other specified postsurgical states)
J45.0 - Pretežno alergijska astma (J45.0 - Predominantly allergic asthma)
